cast.name: 威廉·W·巴伯 William W. Barbour
玛塞拉·布拉吉奥 Marcella Bragio

writer.name: Natasha Dee Davis Natasha Dee Davis

introduction: A young man chooses to follow a path in the shadow of his father, a path which leads down a road of love, betrayal and death. Granted the opportunity of a lifetime, a second chance at life, it's his decision now which will lead to his ultimate salvation or damnation. H.D. is a bold movie socially, taking you for a ride through the murky side of the hood, filled with sex, drugs, pimps and revenge, challenging viewers to reflect upon their mentality. This will be a movie with memorable moments we all can relate to and laugh at. Hood Damnation is an Urban Classic, which will have viewers entertained for years to come.
